SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT RV_NO , SPACE_NAME , BOOK_DATE , RV_CONTENT , RV_STAR , FILE_PATH || FILE_CHANGE_NAME AS "REVIEW_MAINIMG" FROM TB_REVIEW R JOIN TB_BOOK USING (BOOK_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE S ON (R.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO) JOIN TB_FILE ON (REF_BNO = RV_NO) WHERE R.MEM_NO = ? AND RV_STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_CATEGORY = 2 AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND FILE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RV_NO ASC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT RV_NO , BOOK_NO , SPACE_NO , MEM_NO , RV_CONTENT , RV_STAR FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE RV_NO = ?

UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET RV_STATUS = 'N' WHERE RV_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE RV_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_NO = ?

SELECT RV_NO , MEM_ID , SPACE_NAME , RV_STAR , BOOK_DATE , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LIKE_COUNT" FROM TB_LIKE L WHERE R.RV_NO = L.RV_NO ) AS "ALL_LIKE_COUNT" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "RPT_COUNT" FROM TB_REPORT RPT WHERE R.RV_NO = RPT.RPT_REF_NO AND RPT_REF_CAT = 1 ) AS "ALL_RPT_COUNT" , RV_STATUS , RV_ENROLL_DATE FROM TB_REVIEW R JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE USING (SPACE_NO) JOIN TB_BOOK USING (BOOK_NO)

SELECT RV_NO , BOOK_NO , SPACE_NAME , MEM_ID , RV_STAR , RV_CONTENT , RV_ENROLL_DATE , RV_MODIFY_DATE , BOOK_DATE , GR_NO , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LIKE_COUNT" FROM TB_LIKE L WHERE R.RV_NO = L.RV_NO ) AS "ALL_LIKE_COUNT" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "RPT_COUNT" FROM TB_REPORT RPT WHERE R.RV_NO = RPT.RPT_REF_NO AND RPT_REF_CAT = 1 ) AS "ALL_RPT_COUNT" , RV_STATUS FROM TB_REVIEW R JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE USING (SPACE_NO) JOIN TB_BOOK USING (BOOK_NO) WHERE RV_NO=?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "todayRvCount" FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE TO_CHAR(RV_ENROLL_DATE,'yy/mm/dd') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd') FROM DUAL)

SELECT RV_NO , BOOK_NO , SPACE_NAME , MEM_ID , RV_CONTENT , RV_ENROLL_DATE , RV_MODIFY_DATE , RV_STAR , RV_STATUS , GR_NAME , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "ALL_LIKE_COUNT" FROM TB_LIKE L WHERE L.RV_NO = R.RV_NO ) AS "ALL_LIKE_COUNT" , MEM_NO FROM TB_REVIEW R JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN TB_GRADE USING (GR_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE USING (SPACE_NO) WHERE RV_STATUS = 'Y' AND SPACE_NO =?
